Class ColorChooser

java.lang.Object

                  com.objetdirect.tatami.client.ColorChooser
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasFocus, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SourcesClickEvents, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SourcesFocusEvents, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SourcesKeyboardEvents, HasDojo
public class ColorChooser
extends AbstractDojoFocus

Class of widgets that permit to choose a color (represented by a string with an hexadecimal format : #RRGGBB) from a selector of colors DOJO widget.

This component is an encapsulation GWT of Dojo components. Warning the widget exist under 3 faces :

  • a GWT widget (this!)
  • a Dojo widget (which play the role of 'this' for GWT)
  • a structur of DOM elements, the only exploitable presentation by the navigator.

setColor

public void setColor(java.lang.String color)
Sets the selected color. The GWT widget notify a value changement if the color is different.

Parameters:
the - new color to select with a hexadecimal representation format.

onValueChanged

public void onValueChanged(java.lang.String color)
Callback method called by the DOJO widget when a color is selected by the a user. By default this method changes only the color of the GWT widget.

Parameters:
color - the color selected.
See Also:
setColor(String)
